      • getImagePath

      • getImageDimensions

        java.awt.Dimension getImageDimensions()
        get the original dimensions of the (scaled) image. The image will be fit into the window, thus if the image has a width of 1000 pixels and the window is 400px wide, the image will be scaled again.
